Package com.apcfms.annotations

Annotation Interface FrameworkAnnotations

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) @Documented public @interface FrameworkAnnotations
Framework Annotation is user built annotation which is annotated on top of test methods to log the author details and category details to the extent report.

Runtime retention value indicate that this annotation will be available at run time for reflection operations.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Pavan Kumar T

    • author

      String[] author
      Store the authors who created the tests in String[] Mandatory to enter atleast a value
      Returns:
      array of authors provided in test script

    • category

      CategoryType[] category
      Stores the category in form of Enum Array. Include the possible values in CategoryType
      Returns:
      array of categories provided in test script
